channel.title: Stuff
channel.description:
Hey, i was wondering if i could get help with changing exp ratings in trisidiax v2? it has an easy,medium,hard,extreme kind of thing but the exp ratings just like easy mode a x4200 exp multiplier.
I couldnt figure out how to change that so i tried going into the config.java file and changed the melee range and mage multipliers to 2000 hoping itd change the exp rating for the whole server, but im still getting x4200 a hit.
where would i fix this?
i also tried adding an rfd chest to the objecthandler.java, but i had no idea where to paste it and pasted it under other objects in the file, but the chest still hasnt spawned

item.title: Stuff
item.dc:creator: @Karma_K1 Karma_K
item.description:
@Karma_K1 wrote:

all i find is stuff like this

} c.getItems().deleteItem(itemId, slot, 1); c.getItems().addItem(995, c.getShops().getItemShopValue(itemId)/3); c.startAnimation(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[49][2]); c.gfx100(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[49][3]); c.alchDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); sendFrame106(6); addSkillXP(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[49][7] * Config.MAGIC_EXP_RATE, 6); refreshSkill(6);

i dont see any melee or range if this is what it is

Read full topic

item.title: Stuff
item.dc:creator: @k1ng0frs k1ng0frs
item.description:
@k1ng0frs wrote:

check playerassistant.java addskillxp() or something like that
